external.gw.api.webservice.addressbook.contactapi

Interface ABContactAPISearchSpec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GWRemotable
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface ABContactAPISearchSpec
extends GWRemotable
    Specifies search result control parameters.

      • isGetNumResultsOnly

        boolean isGetNumResultsOnly()
        Deprecated. 
        If true, only number of results will be returned, not the results. This is very useful in paging.

      • setGetNumResultsOnly

        void setGetNumResultsOnly(boolean value)
        Deprecated. 
        If true, only number of results will be returned, not the results. This is very useful in paging.

      • getSortColumns

        ABContactSearchSortColumn[] getSortColumns()
        Deprecated. 
        Specifies the sort order of the results. Either null or an empty array can be used to specify that order of results is unimportant.

      • setSortColumns

        void setSortColumns(ABContactSearchSortColumn[] value)
        Deprecated. 
        Specifies the sort order of the results. Either null or an empty array can be used to specify that order of results is unimportant.

      • isWideSearch

        boolean isWideSearch()
        Deprecated. 
        Determines whether to search a wider range of contacts. If true falls back to ABCompany, ABPerson and ABPlace instead of chosing specific search strategies for each subtype.

      • setWideSearch

        void setWideSearch(boolean value)
        Deprecated. 
        Determines whether to search a wider range of contacts. If true falls back to ABCompany, ABPerson and ABPlace instead of chosing specific search strategies for each subtype.
